nodes.text: Arquas'Tais or "Land of Fallen Ones of Valor" was a vast cemetery located outside of Coyn's capital city of En'Tra'Tal. An honor guard of four Coynites in full battle regalia always watched over the field. All Coynites who fell in battle and members of other species who fought for Coyn or died in service to the Mercenary Guild of Coyn were buried here.
